game.name: PAYDAY 2: h3h3 Character Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 앱 내 구매, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Ethan and Hila Klein never really thought they could benefit the PAYDAY gang. But Bain thought otherwise. As Ethan and Hila’s fame reached the sky, Bain saw an opportunity for some more “showmanship” and maybe improving public relations.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ethan and Hila Klein never really thought they could benefit the PAYDAY gang. But Bain thought otherwise. As Ethan and Hila’s fame reached the sky, Bain saw an opportunity for some more “showmanship” and maybe improving public relations.
